Join us for Happy Hour Monday - Thursday from 5PM - 7PM
Make Reservations
Get Social in south beach
Nestled in the heart of South Beach, The Social Club offers a fresh, ingredient-driven take on French Mediterranean cuisine, blending bold coastal flavors with a modern, lighter approach. Our menu is designed for sharing, featuring vibrant small plates like Caracoles and The Pearl. Signature entrées highlight the best of land and sea, from Snapper en Papillote to Steak Frites with truffled bistro fries.
By day, our renowned brunch delivers indulgent favorites with a creative twist such as 7 Seas Benedict with lobster and mango hollandaise or the bold Johnny Cash, featuring corn custard pancakes and jumbo lump crab. Pair your meal with bottomless cocktails, and let the vibrant energy of Miami Beach complete the experience.
At The Social Club, food, drink, and people come together in a relaxed yet refined setting, making every visit unforgettable.
Make Reservations
Featured Events
Industry Night
Mondays | 6PM - 10PM
Mondays just became your new favorite shift. Join us at Let Me Talk to the Manager, an exclusive night for hospitality pros to unwind and indulge. Enjoy 50% off full-price menu items—this night is all about you.
Bottomless Cocktails
Mon-Thu, 7:30AM-1PM | Fri-Sun, 7:30AM-2PM
Brunch daily at The Social Club with endless cocktails like Bloody Marys, Aperol Spritz, Margaritas, and Mimosas. Pair your drink with our delectable dishes for the ultimate group dining experience!
$40 per person. Two-hour maximum.
Power Lunch
Mon-Fri, 12PM - 2PM
New! Need a break between work and meetings? Enjoy our Power Lunch offering. A three-course meal for just $29. Fast, flavorful and hyperlocal.
View Menu

To Share or not to share
View Menus
Try Our New Seasonal Menu
Don't miss out on a one-of-a-kind South Beach culinary adventure. Executive Chef Gastón Sanchez adds a creative and one-of-a-kind twist to each dish, while our beverage program offers a variety of libations from handcrafted cocktails to microbrews and curated wines.

Join us for Happy Hour Monday - Thursday from 5PM - 7PM
About The Social Club
The Social Club offers a stylish perch on Collins Avenue to meet friends or woo a date in the heart of the Miami Beach. Showcasing open-air terraces, skylights and intimate décor, our eclectic design creates a vibrant atmosphere with unique seating arrangements that encourage guests to relax, sip, eat, and stay a while. The kitchen and bar keep the inspiration flowing with their elegant and innovative regionally inspired shareable plates.
Make A Reservation
Meet Our Team
Gastón Sanchez |
executive chef
A descendant of Cuban and Spanish bloodlines, Gastón discovered his passion for food at an early age, spending countless hours honing his skills in the kitchen with his grandmothers. After obtaining a dual degree in Culinary Arts and Business Administration, Gastón explored and refined his skills abroad, where he apprenticed with Michelin-Star chefs. He has also been a private chef for various celebrities, owned and operated his own restaurants and catering companies, was showcased on The Food Network’s Celebrity Dish cooking show, and recieved two Hyatt Excellence Awards.
Luis Ruiz | director of R&B
The Social Club and Kimpton Surfcomber Hotel are thrilled to welcome Luis Rios as the new Director of Restaurants & Bars. With two decades of hospitality experience, including roles at The Mayflower Hotel, Waldorf Astoria, and The Ritz-Carlton, Rios is a seasoned leader known for his passion for creating exceptional dining experiences. A Philadelphia native with Puerto Rican roots, he brings energetic leadership and a commitment to excellence to Miami Beach. Under his guidance, The Social Club and High Tide Beach Bar & Grill promise to deliver vibrant, elevated culinary and beverage offerings in the heart of South Beach.
